What a location! Great exclusive outdoor space! Situated across from Lafayette Park, on a prime Pacific Heights block, this beautiful 1 bedroom condominium is quietly located in the rear of the building. This bright corner unit has great natural light benefiting from both South and West exposure. It has a wonderful layout. French doors from the living room open to a spacious exclusive use patio which you are sure to love. This mid-century modern building has an elevator and garage parking. Don't want to take the elevator during the time of Covid? No problem, it's one floor up from the lobby. With a walk score of 92, it is close to Fillmore restaurants and shops, CPMC, the Van Ness corridor, and more.
